layout_strategy.spacing_scale: Tailwind standard (p-4, p-8, p-16, p-24, p-32)
layout_strategy.grid_system: Bento Grid for Portfolio (mix of col-span-1 and col-span-2)

Hero.structure: Centered layout with floating logo animation.
Hero.background: Use 'Circuit Board' image with heavy overlay + subtle floating shapes.

PricingCards.layout: Grid of 3 cards. Middle card is 'Featured'.

middle_card_special.hover_effect: Trigger 'Gold Dust' particles (tsparticles) inside the card container.

Portfolio.card_style: Image cover + Hover overlay with Title & Link.

AdminPanel.theme: Clean, data-dense, white background with subtle borders.
AdminPanel.features: CRUD for Portfolio, Edit Mission/Vision text, Update Pricing numbers.

particles.preset: Gold Dust (small size, high density, slow float, yellow/gold color)

visual_enhancers.animations: Framer Motion for entrance (fade-up) and hover states.

instructions_to_main_agent: Install 'react-tsparticles' and '@tsparticles/react' and '@tsparticles/slim' for the gold dust effect.
The middle pricing card MUST trigger particles on hover. This is a key requirement.
Use a 'Circuit Board' icon (Lucide) for the logo if no SVG is provided. Color it Purple (#6D28D9).
The contact form submit button must open WhatsApp with a pre-filled message using window.open().
The Portfolio page must have a search bar and category filters (pills) at the top.
Use the provided image URLs for the respective sections.
For the Admin Panel, build a clean dashboard using Shadcn components (Table, Dialog, Form) to manage content.
Ensure the Footer map points to 'ESPOCH, Riobamba'.
Add 'Gabriel Jimenez' and 'Myrian Daquilema' to the authors section ONLY in the Contact page footer.
Make the 'Almy.W.E.B.' branding prominent in the header.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry and grid play.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition (transition: all).
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles (pill or sharp) with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters (ðŸ¤–, etc.) for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations (hover, transition, parallax).
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attribute.
Use named exports for components and default exports for pages.
